#Globe_Score.text: # **The GLOBE score for patients with Primary Biliary Cholangitis (PBC)**

#introduction.text:
*The GLOBE score is an internationally relevant and validated risk assessment tool, able to accurately stratify PBC patients to high and low risk.*

Patients with a GLOBE score corresponding with an estimated transplant-free survival comparable with an age- and sex-matched population are at low risk for future adverse events and patients with a GLOBE score corresponding with a transplant-free survival that significantly deviates from an age- and sex-matched population may benefit from new therapies
